nodes.text: The President can easily ignore 250,000 letters all stating the exact same thing. There are 294,905,636 people in America, courtesy of the US Census Bureau, and 250,000 letters, while being a paltry amount, can also be duplicated easily by the use of spam programs. Using the exact same letter won't work. -BMA
Correct. Form letters go in a junk pile. Individual letters are a different matter.
